name: Landscape as Abstraction #1
description: This is the first is a series of sculptures made using the program Gravity Sketch in Virtual Reality. Sculptures are textured and animated in Blender using unique videofeedback from vintage video hardware. This piece used a combination of the Panasonic MX50 and the LZX Vidiot. Thinking about landscape as an abstract form and a way to see the everyday as brand new.
